name: S心M & SOUL
description:
S心M & SOUL is a single player, narrative driven action adventure game. You are placed in an unknown world, filled with musical elements, and a character that looks like a dumpling tells you that he's your brother?! 

Follow your “brother” and attack squishy monsters, while traversing through an unknown musical world!

Approximate play time: 25-30 minutes

Squishy Egg Studios Website

 🐣   🐣   🐣 Controls:

[W][A][S][D] Move

[SPACEBAR] Dash

[MOUSE RIGHT CLICK] Attack
